title: List of works by Terence Cuneo
data: Visit of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh to the Department of Engineering , 13 November 1952 ( c. 1952 ) , oil on canvas

intro: Terence Cuneo (1907-1996) was an English painter famous for his scenes of railways, horses, ceremonies, and military action.
